name: Software Developer
description: Develops and maintains software applications. Collaborates with teams to implement new features and fix bugs.
work_hours: Full-time, Monday to Friday, 10 AM – 6 PM

name: Data Analyst
description: Extracts insights from data using tools like SQL, Python, and Excel. Builds dashboards and reports for business teams.
work_hours: Full-time, Monday to Friday, 9 AM – 5 PM

name: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Identifies and mitigates security threats, monitors systems, and implements best practices in cybersecurity.

name: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Builds and deploys machine learning models for automation and analytics. Works with large datasets and cloud platforms.
work_hours: Full-time, flexible schedule with core hours 10 AM – 4 PM

name: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintains CI/CD pipelines, automates deployments, and ensures high system availability and scalability.

name: Front-End Developer
description: Creates user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React or Angular.
work_hours: Full-time, flexible remote or office hours

name: Back-End Developer
description: Develops server-side applications, APIs, and databases using languages like Node.js, Python, or Java.
work_hours: Full-time, Monday to Friday, 9 AM – 5 PM

name: Cloud Engineer
description: Designs and manages cloud infrastructure on platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.

name: QA Engineer
description: Tests software products for bugs and performance issues. Develops automated test cases.
work_hours: Full-time, Monday to Friday, flexible hours

name: Database Administrator
description: Manages and optimizes databases, ensures data integrity and security, and performs backups and recovery.
work_hours: Full-time, 9 AM – 6 PM, occasional weekend maintenance
